ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T13:56:02 [Issue ID 4000-185655] urn:comicvine:4000-185655 urn:comixology:710016 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 12:24:26. [Issue ID 273848]
ComicInfo.Series: Citizen V and the V-Battalion: The Everlasting
ComicInfo.Summary: From the pages of THUNDERBOLTS, it's Citizen V! Citizen V is back -- literally! John Watkins III, rogue, scoundrel, adventurer, and ball-grabber returns as the lead covert operative of the paramilitary peace organization, the V-Battalion! And for his first adventure... how about the return of an assassin his grandmother killed decades earlier? How about civil war erupting in small volatile countries all over the world? And how about a sleeping giant?

ComicInfo.Title: Time Enough for Living
